title: Nicky Morgan – 2019 Speech to Conservative Party Conference
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the speech made by Nicky Morgan, the Secretary of State Digital, Culture, Media and Sport, on 30 September 2019 at the Conservative Party conference in Manchester.
